actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 93-1091.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 93-929.

official_title: Concurrent resolution to provide for the printing as a House document "Our American Government.  What Is It?  How Does It Work?"

summary.text: Provides that there shall be printed, as a House document, a revised edition of the House document "Our American Government. What Is It? How Does It Work?"; and that five hundred thousand additional copies be printed, of which four hundred and forty-two thousand shall be for the use of the House of Representatives and one hundred and three thousand shall be for the use of the Senate, and twenty thousand shall be for the use of the Joint Committee on Printing.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution to provide for the printing as a House document "Our American Government.  What Is It?  How Does It Work?"
